title: Nukeproof torque up the Scout(er) w/ super mega whopper boost spacing (168mm)
content:
Nukeproof have announced an all-new edition of the Scout, dubbed the Scout(er). Complete with an all-new rear axle standard and technology from a bygone era, the Scout(er) is a fast(er) iteration of Nukeproof’s hardcore hardtail, the Scout. Nukeproof Scout(er) The hopes of many awaiting the release of Nukeproof’s first eMTB will be dashed today when […]

The post Nukeproof torque up the Scout(er) w/ super mega whopper boost spacing (168mm) appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
